content.question:
You will be asked to speak in Chinese on a specific topic. Imagine you are making an oral presentation to your Chinese class. First, you will read and hear the topic for your presentation. Then you will have 2 minutes to record your presentation. Your presentation should be as complete as possible.

Choose ONE Chinese technological development that has allowed people to be more efficient and environmentally friendly (such as Pinyin input on mobile phones, social-media messaging apps, high-speed trains, etc.). In your presentation, describe this development and explain its significance.

Prompt 1
